tool_description: Power your application with Two Factor Authentication with OTP API. Generate OTP code and validation API are available where you just have to worry about your application logic.
name: ShoutOUT OTP
title: ShoutOUT OTP

api_list.name: Send an OTP
api_list.description: Send auto generated one time pass code to the given mobile number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shoutout-otp1.p.rapidapi.com/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shoutout-otp1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Verify an OTP
api_list.description: Verify the OTP code send by the customer
